metadata.title: CVE-2017-2486 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in certain Apple products. iOS before 10.3 isaffected. Safari before 10.1 is affected. The issue involves the "WebKit"component. It allows remote attackers to spoof the address bar via acrafted web site.

criterions.comment: qtwebkit-opensource-src package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
